programme.title: Phantom Punch
programme.desc: The fascinating life story of Sonny Liston, the controversial heavyweight boxing champion of the world.

programme.title: Brain On Fire
programme.desc: A young, capable professional cannot explain her newly erratic behavior.

programme.title: The Poker House
programme.desc: A dramatization of Lori Petty's teenage years spent in small town Iowa.

programme.title: Chopper
programme.desc: Chopper tells the intense story of Mark "Chopper" Read, a legendary criminal who wrote his autobiography while serving a jail sentence in prison. His book, "From the Inside", upon which the film is based, was a best-seller.

programme.title: Fist Of Legend [Subbed]
programme.desc: In 1937, a Chinese martial artist returns to Shanghai to find his teacher dead and his school harassed by the Japanese.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts
programme.desc: Joel and the bots watch a short about the very different sleeping habits of two children.

programme.title: City On Fire
programme.desc: An undercover cop infiltrates a gang of thieves who plan to rob a jewelry store.

programme.title: Hard Boiled
programme.desc: A tough-as-nails cop teams up with an undercover agent to shut down a sinister mobster and his crew.

programme.title: Samurai Reincarnation
programme.desc: The villain is called Amakusa Shiro Tokaisada. He is actually based on a real christian samurai. The movie was one of the inspirations for the game called 'Samurai Shodown' (actual spelling)

programme.title: Crime Story [Dubbed]
programme.desc: Jackie Chan stars in one of his grittiest roles ever as a police detective on the edge, who must race against time to solve a deadly kidnapping case. Based on the shocking true story of a billionaire abducted in a bold ambush, and filled with explosive martial-arts battles, Crime Story pulses with tension and excitement. Director Kirk Wong (The Big Hit) deftly combines acrobatic fight choreography with edge-of-your-seat action for this thrilling and dramatic tour-de-force for Jackie Chan.
